parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The new remarks of the network domain.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host to which the network domain to modify belongs.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainId
parameters.description: The ID of the network domain to modify.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainName
parameters.description: The new name of the network domain.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainType
parameters.description:
The new connection mode of the network domain. Valid values:

*   **Direct**
*   **Proxy**

parameters.name: Proxies
parameters.description: The information about the proxy servers in the network domain.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host to which the network domain to modify belongs.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
